page.title: 10EDUCATION
page.content: Formerly there was a Parish School with 3 teachers in the 1920s.The population declined, and the school was closed in 1973, leaving the block{ {without any educational facilities. Children in the west go to Redmyre Primary School and then to Mearns Academy, Laurencekirk. Those in the east go to Inverbervie Primary School and then to Mackie Academy, Stonehaven. Although parents have a {choice of schools,}their choice is subject to the availability of Council transport to the schools. From their secondary schools the children have the same opportunities for further education as do any children. Tuition in music and dancing (highland, ballet, tap) is available privately in neighbouring areas. Pre-school children can attend the{Playgroup}in the Parish Hall two mornings a week.
